name: Lamp Toggle
description: Beautiful animated lamp component for theme switching with smooth animations
author: Ozhan Gebesoglu

isDark.description: Current theme state - true for dark, false for light

onToggle.description: Callback function when lamp is clicked

examples.name: Basic Usage
Different Sizes
examples.code:
<LampToggle size="small" isDark={isDark} onToggle={toggleTheme} />
<LampToggle size="medium" isDark={isDark} onToggle={toggleTheme} />
<LampToggle size="large" isDark={isDark} onToggle={toggleTheme} />
